input: Perform a batch operation to get UUIDs, IDs, and lifecycle statuses of all prolongation requests.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractProlongationRequests?$select=UUID,ID,LifeCycleStatusCode HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
